text: Philippe Meunier (born 16 March 1966 in Bron, Rhône) is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Rhône department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bron Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Regional councillors of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
title: Philippe Meunier
